alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 1:44PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow Above 3000 feet. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. * WHERE...Lookout Pass, Dobson Pass, and Mullan. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions over the mountain passes late this evening into Sunday afternoon. Winter driving conditions may develop in the lower elevations Sunday Night into Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations below 3000 feet could see 1 to 3 inches of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
